briefTitle: 12-Month, Open-Label, Extension Study of LCP-AtorFen in Dyslipidemia
officialTitle: A 12-Month, Open-Label, Extension Study of the Safety and Efficacy of LCP-AtorFen in Subjects With Dyslipidemia
summary: The current study is designed to test the long-term (12-month) safety and efficacy of LCP-AtorFen, a combination of atorvastatin and fenofibrate, in patients with dyslipidemia

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Non-HDL Cholesterol, HDL Cholesterol, TG Levels From Baseline to End of Treatment
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 52 weeks from DB baseline and 40 weeks from OL baseline
